editorial:
We will learn how to find the number of sub-squares that cover the cell
: . Next, we will use a straightforward greedy algorithm: we will place
the tallest gorillas in the cells covered by the maximum number of
squares. This can be done using two operations and a linear pass.The
time complexity of the solution is: .
name: E. Photoshoot for Gorillas
statement:
You really love gorillas, so you decided to organize a photoshoot for
them. Gorillas live in the jungle. The jungle is represented as a grid
of n rows and m columns. w gorillas agreed to participate in the
photoshoot, and the gorilla with index i (1
le i
le w) has a of a_i. You want to place the gorillas in the cells of the
grid such that there is in each cell.The of the arrangement is equal to
the sum of the of all sub-squares of the grid with a side length of
k.The of a sub-square is equal to the sum of the of the gorillas in
it.From all suitable arrangements, choose the arrangement with the .
solutions: #include <bits/stdc++.h>#include<array>using namespace std;#define ll long long#define int long long#define y1 idfsu#define PII pair<int, int>#define fi first#define se second#define endl "\n"const int MAX = 1e9;const int MAXN = 1e6 + 10;const int mod = 1e9 + 7;const int N = 200010;int aa[200010];void solve(){    int n, m, k;    cin >> n >> m >> k;    vector<vector<int>>o(n + 2, vector<int>(m + 2));    for (int i = 1; i <= n - k+1; i++)        for (int j = 1; j <= m - k+1; j++)            o[i][j]++, o[i + k][j]--, o[i][j + k]--, o[i + k][j + k]++;    priority_queue<int>p;    for(int i = 1;i<=n;i++)        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)        {            o[i][j] += o[i - 1][j] + o[i][j - 1] - o[i - 1][j - 1];            p.push(o[i][j]);        }    int sum = 0, mm;    cin >> mm;    for (int i = 1; i <= mm; i++)        cin >> aa[i];    sort(aa + 1, aa + mm + 1);    for(int i = mm;i;i--)    {        int a = aa[i];        sum += p.top() * a;        p.pop();    }    cout << sum << endl;}signed main(){    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);    cin.tie(0);    cout.tie(0);    int T = 1;    cin >> T;    while (T--)        solve();    return 0;}
